title: Why ranked match-ups much worst then normals?
body: I played a few ranked game this season and when looking at the team's W/L ratio, riot love to put together people with negative W/L vs the others with Positive W/L. The results are quite obvious form start to finish... surrender 20 gg... As while playing in many Normal games, those games are so much more winnable on both sides. I guess riot is playing gods again this season!
